answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Andy,
Software Express is a British company that provides image-enhancing software for low-vision and blind people. It has won an award from the Royal National Institute of the Blind, and has capabilities in the US, Canada, the UK, and Europe. 
http://www.softwareexpress.co.uk/
This website has a list of websites that provide information about software for the blind and low-vision, as well as other useful links for issues such as eye care and senior housing.
http://www.ahaf.org/macular/resources/helpfulorganizations.html
The following link is a list of various softwares that serve that purpose, with descriptions of each.
http://www.ebility.com/links/vip.php
Hope this was helpful!

author: Andy White
text:
We are looking at software to permit access to the Internet to the public who have low or no vision.
Does anyone have any experience good or bad with a particular product?
thank you!
title: Software for Low Vision or Blind Customers
